name: Troll's chainmail
data: It increases the users strength pitifully.
It decreases the users dexterity pitifully.
It increases the users constitution pitifully.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has adequate armour class for its type (adequate in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
